definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
arising involuntarily (idiom); spontaneous/to spring up unbidden (of emotion)
with a grunting sound it stops (idiom); to come to an end spontaneously (esp. of sound)
to know that it is so but not why it is so (idiom)
pinyin: zhi1 qi2 ran2 er2 bu4 zhi1 qi2 suo3 yi3 ran2
containing_words.word: 知其然而不知其所以然

definition: to recover speedily (idiom); to get better quickly
happen unexpectedly/turn out contrary to one's expectations

sentences.english: Still, who are we to say that we can stay?
sentences.chinese: 然而，谁有敢说我们能长留此地？

sentences.english: However, satisfaction also appears to be influenced by psychologic factors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，满意程度似乎也是整个身体的影响因素之一。

sentences.english: However, dependence need not be long term.
sentences.chinese: 然而，依赖并不需要很长时间。

sentences.english: However, Toni, who knows Ribery well, believes the Bianconeri should sign him.
sentences.chinese: 然而托尼很了解里贝里，并且相信尤文会签下他。

sentences.english: However, traveling in groups means less freedom.
sentences.chinese: 然而，组团旅行较少自由。
然而，我们必须小心谨慎。

sentences.english: Mr Thant, however, skirts three difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有三个问题吴丹敏处理不得当。

sentences.english: However, even resist to all tin not do it, again He Tan resists.
sentences.chinese: 然而，连抗拒都做不到，又何谈反抗。

sentences.english: However, the fate of teaser , your stock has fallen to 7 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 然而命运捉弄人，你的股票跌到7元了。

sentences.english: Keyes, however, was on foot at the back of the parade.
sentences.chinese: 然而，凯斯走在游行队伍的最后面。

sentences.english: However some grownup parents never figure out how to talk to a child.
sentences.chinese: 然而，许多家长怎么也学不会正确地和孩子交谈。

sentences.english: Project-based ecosystem services accounting has its limitations, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而作为项目基础的生态系统服务会计有其局限性。

sentences.english: Yet the timeless in you is aware of life's timelessness
sentences.chinese: 然而你们心中的无限，意识到生命的无限。

sentences.english: However, Sir Gus deplored Dr Fox's judgment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，奥唐奈对福克斯的决断深表遗憾。

sentences.english: But there shall not an hair of your head perish.
sentences.chinese: 然而你们连一根头发，也必不损坏。

sentences.english: Gray-matter maturity, however, does not signal the end of mental change.
sentences.chinese: 然而灰质的成熟并不标志着智力变换的终结。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
